verses.verse: Now [this] was the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> for he was the first-born of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%> To <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the first-born of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> the father of <S%H1>Gilead,<s%> was <S%H1568>allotted<s%> <S%H1961>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1568>Bashan,<s%> <S%H1316>because<s%> he was a <S%H3588>man<s%> of <S%H376>war.<s%>

So [the lot] was [made] for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families:<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H844>Asriel<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%> and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida;<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [were] the <S%H2145>male<s%> [descendants] of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

However, <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3588>only<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%> and <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And they <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> our <S%H251>brothers.<s%>" So <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>command<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their father's <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

Thus there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H9112>portions<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H4480><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%>

<S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5157>received<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> <S%H1961>belonged<s%> to the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1961>ran<s%> from <S%H836>Asher<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H5921>east<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H3225>southward<s%> to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of En-tappuah.

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> <S%H1961>belonged<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> but <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> [belonged] to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H428>(these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> [belonged] to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>), and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> [was] on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook,<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

The <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H5045>side<s%> [belonged] to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6828>side<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was their <S%H1366>border;<s%> and they <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> and to <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> on the <S%H4217>east.<s%>

And in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and in <S%H836>Asher,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> Beth-shean and its <S%H1323>towns<s%> and <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of En-dor and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> the <S%H7969>third<s%> is <S%H5316>Napheth.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> because the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>persisted<s%> in <S%H3427>living<s%> in that <S%H776>land.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2388>became<s%> <S%H2388>strong,<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>forced<s%> <S%H4522>labor,<s%> but they did not <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out <S%H3423>completely.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4069>"Why<s%> have you <S%H5414>given<s%> me only <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H9112>portion<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> since I am a <S%H7227>numerous<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H5704>far<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%>?"

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H518>"If<s%> you are a <S%H7227>numerous<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to the <S%H9194>forest<s%> and <S%H1254>clear<s%> a place for yourself <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and of the <S%H7497>Rephaim,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is too <S%H213>narrow<s%> for you."

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> is not <S%H4672>enough<s%> for us, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> both those <S%H834>who<s%> are in Beth-shean and its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and those <S%H834>who<s%> are in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>"

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "You are a <S%H7227>numerous<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> and have <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power;<s%> you shall not <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> [only,]

but the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> shall be yours. For though it is a <S%H9194>forest,<s%> you shall <S%H1254>clear<s%> it, and to its <S%H8444>farthest<s%> <S%H8444>borders<s%> it shall be yours; for you shall <S%H3423>drive<s%> out the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> [and] <S%H3588>though<s%> they are <S%H2389>strong.<s%> "
